thread.title: Re: Sally Kohn just accidentally fact-checked herself on the Neil Gorsuch–Fascism Forever story
thread.title_full: Re: Sally Kohn just accidentally fact-checked herself on the Neil Gorsuch–Fascism Forever story

author: Dr. Arrogant-eh!? _Canuck
title: Re: Sally Kohn just accidentally fact-checked herself on the Neil Gorsuch–Fascism Forever story
text:
Sally Kohn just accidentally fact-checked herself on the Neil Gorsuch–Fascism Forever story Posted at 4:52 pm on February 3, 2017 by Greg P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Sally Kohn has taken to posting a #DailyActofResistance over on her timeline with today’s asking her followers to call their senators to protest Neil Gorsuch because he founded a “friggin fascism fan club” in high school: Get on this people. We need Supreme Court judges who are a check on fascism, not fans of it! #DailyActOfResistance #StopGorsuch ✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿 pic.twitter.com/W2esEACmwr 
— Sally Kohn (@sallykohn) February 3, 2017 
As everyone knows by now , there’s nothing to this story. And if you don’t believe us, check with Snopes who found it “false”: @sallykohn @NekoCase No fan of Gorsuch, but let's get 'em on the facts! Or do you know something Snopes doesn't? https://t.co/zjv6Gak1dD 
— Ryan Spain (@RyanSpain) February 3, 2017 Trending
